body:
Overview

HackerRank integration with SmartRecruiters helps you manage your HackerRank tests and interviews inside the SmartRecruiters platform. This article will act as a user guide for you to understand how to use HackerRank's integration with SmartRecruiters effectively.

The below steps are written assuming you have already gone through the SmartRecruiters - HackerRank Configuration. If you are yet to do that, please do it by following the steps here.


HackerRank Tests Integration with SmartRecruiters

  • Once you have completed the integration, click on the People option from the top navbar.

 

  • You will be taken to a list of the candidates. Here select the desired candidate to open their profile.

  • Inside the candidate's profile page, click on Browse under the Assessments tab. You will see a popup where the tests created by you in your HackerRank for Work user account will be visible. Select the test title you desire by ticking the checkbox beside it and clicking on Continue. 

  • Click on Send on the following page to send a test invitation to the candidate.  

   

  • Once you have successfully sent the test invitation, you will be notified about the same on the right pane of the candidate's profile page. 

  • When the candidate finishes their test and gets evaluated, you can see their marks and qualification status as shown below. 

  • When a test is in completed status, you can visit the candidate report page on HackerRank by clicking on the link icon as shown below.  

Adding an Inline Assessment 

  • Click on the profile icon from the top right corner and select Settings/Admin.

  • Select Hiring Process from the Settings page.  

  • Click on the Add in-line Assessment button on the following page. 

  • On the following page, you can see the list of Tests created by you in your HackerRank account. Select an assessment from the list.

Whenever a candidate applies for a job, they'll have to take this test before they submit the application.

When the candidate clicks on Next, they are redirected to take the HackerRank test you chose in the last step automatically. Once the test is finished, they are redirected to the SmartRecruiters platform.

HackerRank Interviews Integration with SmartRecruiters

  • Once you have completed the integration, click on the People option from the top navbar. 

  • You will be taken to a list of the candidates. Here select the desired candidate to open their profile.

  • Inside the candidate's profile page, click on Browse. Select the HackerRank Interview by ticking the checkbox beside it and clicking on Continue to generate the interview link. 

  • Once the interview link is generated, you can locate it on the right pane, as shown below. 

  • Copy the interview URL and share it with the candidate. 
  • You can do that by clicking on the Email from the top navigation bar. 

  • You can see the ratings and the comments on the right pane when the interview is over, as shown below.  
  • You can access the interview report by clicking on the link icon.
title: SmartRecruiters - HackerRank Integration User Guide
